breakdowns.description: Adds given numbers and shares the output.
conditions: Output can be negative or positive.

breakdowns.description: Subtracts the smaller number from the greater number and shares the output.
conditions: Input numbers can be negative or positive.
Output can be negative or positive.

breakdowns.description: Multiplies two given numbers and shares the output.
conditions: Input numbers can be negative or positive.
Output can be negative or positive.

breakdowns.description: Divides two given numbers and shares the output.
conditions: Input numbers can be negative or positive.
Should not be divided by zero.
Always handle the exception of dividing by zero.
